name: Flying Dragon Simulator 2019
description:
Welcome to the best flying fire drake simulator of 2019. Fly your dream fire breathing red dragon, master your drake riding skills. Start the game from drake nest and flap your dragon wings through the sky to fly. Discover exciting islands and mountains. Blaze fire to raptors, smash village houses enjoy being a fire drake!
You can do whatever you want in magical world of dragons!


Flying Fire Drake Simulator 3D is made for all fans of flying dragon games, Simulation games and Dinosaur games

Download and play for free!

Game Features
- Realistic Mountains & Islands
- Incredible flying dragon model
- Stunning HD Graphics
- Realistic dragon animations
- Beautiful Landscapes
- Easy and Free to use
Enjoy ツ
developers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
